(The Alliance can't die, it's immortal.  Immortal!  As long as Majic-12 and 
STAAR and Aspasia and Artad want it around, that is...and Icedemon, Pyro is 
now part of Oblitertron, please restate your post

JOKER'S ON THE REBOUND BABY!)


Oblitertron/Sixshot/Dark Wolf/Double 
Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Ares/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Firestarter/
Chordate:





Oblitertron was large.  But he wasn't stupid.  Well, not that stupid.

He raised his left arm, firing off two fire balls, intercepting most of the 
missiles, moving his head to the right, letting the missile harmlessly fly 
by.  He fired off an optic blast directly at the charge as he moved his head.

He felt the missile and shells strike him and grunted.  He grew weary of this 
weak battle.

The gestalt raised his right arm, firing off three bolts from his rifle at 
Hysteria.

---

Sixshot saw Ares had control of the situation, and shifted his aim.  He fired 
off four shots from both cannons in both batteries.

Sixteen blasts lanced out at Gigan.

---

Dark Wolf let out a raspy, animal-like laugh as the optics hit his chest.  He 
looked down at his chest, another orb forming.  He lifted it and threw his 
arm forward, but turned quickly, throwing the orb at the Cybertronian Fire 
instead.

He let out a howl as the orb got passed the shields and blew up against the 
hull of the ship.

---

Double Punch sidestepped, the missiles passing by, most of the shots 
folloiwng, but two struck his left arm.  He cursed, raising both arms and 
firing off an energy-signature seeking missile from both arms at Sideswipe.

---

Injector ducked the laser blasts, the missile knocking him backwards.  He 
fired off 15 rapid optic blasts down at Torca.

---

Manterror slid through the air, dodging the missile, six shots striking him 
in the side.  He flew to the side still, raising an arm, firing off three ion 
disks down at Ratchet.

---

Bumblebee flew to the side, two nail sticking into his left shoulder.  He 
fired off two stinger missiles from both stinger missiles, four stinger 
missiles heading for Torca.

---

Scattershot flew forward, firing off twenty-five explosive rounds at 
Tavatron, the energy blast striking him in the left side.  He slowly 
descended, but his mind clicked, and he ignored the pain because he was 
psychotic.

---

Nemesis Enforcer raised his rifle, firing off twenty rapid laser blasts at 
the CF.

---

Firestarter flew through the air, looking around for a target, only a few 
hundred feet away.

===

Chordate checked the readings.  Shields were only at 4%, hull was at 89%.  He 
cursed, not knowing of another ower supply to aid the shields.
